title: Top spin and back spin strokes
creator_credit: Gerard Holdsworth Productions, Richard Hackett and Don Kelly
brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Table tennis”
Part 2 of a series of four films which show that table tennis is a very competitive sport played throughout the world by people of all ages. The game is built around attacking and defensive strokes. Some of these strokes are demonstrated like: topspin; forehand drive; backhand drive; backspin, forehand chop and backhand chop.
creator_credit_for_label: Gerard Holdsworth Productions, Richard Hackett and Don Kelly
